{"blocks":[{"key":"37u4m","text":"Remove all the liquid ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fik22","text":"Leave tubes/wells open to dry   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"38liv","text":"Generally, a 5 min dry time is enough, but it will depend on room temperature and humidity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6C9AC18D554A11EDB33C0A58A9FEAC02","id":"50915","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1h0td","text":"If using multiple tubes, resuspend in one tube and use that resuspension to resuspend the rest of the tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lv1t","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"43","error":false,"guid":"709E1DC3554A11EDB33C0A58A9FEAC02","id":"92098","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6nkg","text":"Quickly spin down and incubate at    for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7i12p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":true,"guid":"AE792830554A11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"room","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"B56E9EE0554A11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cl56l","text":"Place tube in magnetic stand and incubate at room temperature for   or until liquid is clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"453lo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"D4AC35B0554A11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dhge","text":"Transfer   to a clean, labeled tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dgrf0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"CD3B7480554A11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpmnm","text":"If there is no 150-250 bp peak or it is \u003c5% proceed to loading the pool into sequencer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae1gp","text":"Place the gel in an electrophoresis system and fill up with TBE buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fp75c","text":"Load   DNA ladder to the first lane. Use a ladder that allows to distinguish 200 bp from 400 bp peaks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eja1p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5-10","error":false,"guid":"3CA778F0554B11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fah6j","text":"Add   6X loading buffer to the   pool tube. Vortex and spin to collect liquids","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1t92q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"608D1400554B11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"64CCB980554B11EDB33E8DB40D4E5300","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m6hr","text":"Load the pool into 1 or more lanes (depending on comb size you may not be able to fit in one lane). Leave an unused lane between the ladder and the pool","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bi147","text":"Run with constant voltage at 140 V for 1 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qius","text":"After 1 h quickly image the gel. If there is a clear separation between primer dimers (~200 bp) and amplicons (~400 bp), you may continue to excise. Otherwise, run for longer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ldit","text":"Once the 2 bands are well separated, excise the 400 bp band","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eaf35","text":"Using a DNA gel extraction kit, dissolve the excised gel and run through a column following manufacturer’s instructions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rrc1","text":"Elute with   elution buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"boi7s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"AD1E0F90554B11ED9EFB4B3C4F94EF53","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ust","text":"Follow the instructions corresponding to the system you are using","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69dj9","text":"If there is no 150-250 peak or it is \u003c5% proceed to loading the pool into sequencer. Otherwise, you may need to run another gel extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
